question: Harry Styles 7 please~
answer:
Prompt(s): “Because nobody cares about me” 

“Sometimes I feel like when I need somebody, nobody cares..” she huffed out as he sat down besides her, this had seem to become a reacquiring sense for the two. Though he had tried to assure many times it wasn’t what it seemed. “It’s not that I know it’s not.” she huffed out. 

“Babe I’m sorry.” he mumbled softly not knowing how he was able to help her. It was all a bit too much and overwhelming, she had so many people do her wrong int he past. Harry feared of becoming one of them, one of the ones who break so terribly he’d wonder of she’d ever even give him a glance afterwards. 

“I know it’s silly it’s just how I feel sometimes.” she shrugged taken a sip of her tea. He watched her silently nodded his head, it was hard when all you wanted was to comfort her but knew she was dead set on doing this alone, not that she had to ever face something alone in her life. 

“But you don’t like that those things anymore right?” he asked for confirmation almost scared of hitting a nerve that would cause her to freak out silently in her. He’d seen it happen before and it was most possibly the worst thing he’s ever had to witness in his life. 

“No not necessarily but we all have those days you know?” she chuckled softly sending him a smile. “those days were you just get so worked up and you when someone asks if you need help you just scream ‘because nobody. cares about me.’” She shrugged with a light chuckle. 

“but you know it’s not true.” he mumbled with a soft smile as she nodded her head looking around. She hated to admit it but he was right all long, she had to give herself that little push and allow others in to make her feel better. Keeping things bottled up was making it worst instead of helping and she thanked him for that every single day. 

‘Thank you.” 

“For what?” 

‘For making me a better, friend, daughter and person.”

summary:
Thoughts on Harry and cats and dogs (and Larry)
Is someone who loves dogs automatically a cat hater? Is this also the other way...
body:
Thoughts on Harry and cats and dogs (and Larry)

Is someone who loves dogs automatically a cat hater? Is this also the other way around?

Just because we haven’t seen recent pictures of him with cats means he doesn’t love them. Have you seen a recent picture of him and Louis? Does this mean he doesn’t love him? I’m crying and you are too.

Don’t know how I came from cats and dogs to questions on Larry…

blog.name: theresnosinlondon
blog.title: S
blog.description: Just wanted to post about Harry Styles, to be honest.

title: 4. Café
body:
Finally having some time off in Los Angeles put me in such a good mood that I didn’t even want to make plans.

I woke up at a reasonable time in the morning, took a long, relaxing shower, air dried, put light clothes on, light make up and got out.

When I hailed the taxi I didn’t even stutter when reciting an address to the driver - it has been on my mind since I opened my eyes that morning.

It was a well known, but quite laid back place nonetheless, on the west side of the ‘city of angels’ and they had the best pancakes of the coast.

I asked for a small porch table, under a giant umbrella that shielded me from the scorching beam of the sun. I took a seat and just breathed in the fresh salty air, before ordering a freshly squeezed glass of orange juice.

When the waitress left to fetch me my beverage, I lazily (and uselessly) browsed the menu, only confirming what my mind was on. Blueberry pancakes with sour cream and nuts.

I smiled up at the waitress when she set the tall glass filled with juice, accompanied with a bright green straw and a floaty orange slice.

She took my order and moved to another table. I followed her with my eyes momentarily, liking the colour of her hair, before I heard the slow drawl of a voice ordering a muffin. When I moved my eyes to glance at the person, I was half surprised to see Harry, with a laid back posture, sunglasses covering his eyes and a casual fedora on his head, leaving some curls poking from under its edge.

He wasn’t smiling, but his aura just gave away how kind he really was, to the point where nobody even questioned his lack of a smile.

I was slightly transfixed on his persona to the point where I almost didn’t notice his head turning in my direction. I couldn’t tell, at the beginning, if he was actually looking my way, because of the shades resting on the bridge of his nose, but when the corner of his lips uplifted a bit and he gave the slightest nod of his head, I knew he was greeting me.

I wasn’t feeling awkward or shy, I was just extremely flattered that he remembered me from the Imagine Dragons event a couple of weeks ago.

I smiled and gave a weak wave of the fingers, then turned the plate that had just been placed in front of me at that moment, and I noticed the plate on the waitress’ other hand, with a muffin on it.

She offered me a cordial smile and proceeded to moved to his table, settng his order in front of him and heading back inside the café.

I didn’t look back at him, deciding to play it cool and just take my relaxed time to slowly go through my glorious pancakes. It is uncanny ow the right recipe can make the sun brighter and the sky bluer.

Still, I couldn’t help but let my eyes glance at him from time to time, seeing him either thoroughly going through his muffin or chatting quietly with, who I suppose is, his friend.

–

I was still sat at the table after finishing my breakfast, now with a refreshing iced green tea in front of me and flipping through a magazine.

I was engrossed in an article about the last trends on accessories when I saw him from the corner of my eyes. He stood up at the same time his friend did, gave a firm shake of the hand and a friendly hug with lots of promises of catching up soon, then the bald-headed guy made his way into the café and to the exit.

I slowly bit my lip and turned my gaze back on Harry, who was now sitting back at the table and raising his cup to finish his drink. His shades were folded and now hanging on the opening of his half buttoned shirt. I honestly wondered why he even bothered putting it on - I cant say I knw many people who would complain if he just decided to disregard the garment alltogether.

I barely lifted my eyes to his face when I saw his turning in my direction, making me self conscious about how I was staring at him.

His body was angled away from me, his elbow on the table, supporting his hand that’s holding the cup, still at his lips. His eyes, though, they were on me.

As nonchalantly as possible, I gave a weak smile and focused back on my magazine, shaking my head at myself at my stupidity. I was eyeing him like a prey, in the middle of the day, in open sight.

“Shaya, is it?”

Granted, our tables weren’t too far from each other, but he still managed to use a level of voice high enough for me to hear, still not too loud so that everyone would’ve been able to notice.

I paused for a slight second, then lifted my head and locked eyes with him. He had a gentle expression on his face and raised eyebrows, reminding me of his question.

“The one and only. Hi Harry.” My tone light, trying to keep the calm atmosphere.

He chuckled, looked at his hands, shook his head and looked back at me, a smile still on his lips.

“Can I offer you another drink?” His offer hung in the air for a couple seconds before I smiled and nodded, waving him over.

His lanky figure raised from the seat, trying to be smooth, but little did he know I notice the slight stumble when he caught his foot on the leg of his chair. I pulled my lips between my teeth, supressing a giggle as I watched him collect his things from the table and make his way over.

I gently closed the magazine and put it aside as he slid in the seat to my left and got comfortable, leaning his forearms on the edge of the table.  We smiled at each other and he waved the waitress over.

I didn’t know why, but the awkwardness shifted and a sense of excitement took over.

I paused for a slight second, then lifted my head and locked eyes with him. He had a gentle expression on his face and raised eyebrows, reminding me of his question.

“The one and only. Hi Harry.” My tone light, trying to keep the calm atmosphere.

He chuckled, looked at his hands, shook his head and looked back at me, a smile still on his lips.

“Can I offer you another drink?” His offer hung in the air for a couple seconds before I smiled and nodded, waving him over.

His lanky figure raised from the seat, trying to be smooth, but little did he know I notice the slight stumble when he caught his foot on the leg of his chair. I pulled my lips between my teeth, supressing a giggle as I watched him collect his things from the table and make his way over.

I gently closed the magazine and put it aside as he slid in the seat to my left and got comfortable, leaning his forearms on the edge of the table.  We smiled at each other and he waved the waitress over.

I didn’t know why, but the awkwardness shifted and a sense of excitement took over.

body:
Flight Style (Niall Horan Imagine Fluff)

Alright don’t judge me on this, i was gonna write a smut but I don’t think it’ll be that great or even relevant so instead I came up with this fluff short imagine while I was on the plane. Enjoy ~

.

.

4.30 AM

I saw the clock meanwhile doing my eyebrows to look at least decent and not a browless alien. “Why are you even doing your make up? It’s like 4 AM love, we’re goin to the airport anyways not the awards Y/N” he chuckles beside me. Brushing my brows the last time, I put on a bit concealer and some blush to make my skin look a lil bit more awake. “You know I can’t leave without my brows Ni. Especially with paps chasing you everywhere, I don’t think anybody will fancy a pic of browless ghoul me beside you.” I said looking at him. Niall and I are going to Paris for his match and me, just being there supporting him and tagging along just because I will take all the time I can have with him. Besides, Niall playing golf? Wouldn’t miss it for the world.

“You don’t need to wear that darling. Just look at me in my shoes.” He said after hearing me cuss at the small stain on my pale pink pumps. “It seems quite uncomfortable love.” I look at him wincing at my feet. “It’s not that high of a heel and it’s a block heel. So I’m good.” I told him. Grabbing my bag, I walked out of the room and heading downstairs after him.

“Aye me girl dressing so good while I look like this.” Niall joke as he motions to his body. He is currently in his black hoodie and shorts along with the white nike sneakers and a cap. “Oh please. You know you look good without even trying.” I scoffed and smile at him. “Just sayin’ babe. It’s gone be a long flight ye know.” I sighed sipping on the tea at the counter. “I know. I just, like to look good okay? Especially when you are constantly being surrounded by paps and people taking picstures of you. Not to mention when you have a boyfriend that look so damn good especially in hoodie that is just cuddly and snuggly.” I said taking another sip on my tea. It’s hot.

Niall laughs and look at me. “Dressing good fo just paps?” He cocked his brow. “Well, that and for someone obviously!” I said while playfully acting serious. “C'mon. We have to catch our flight.”

.

The flight took about 11 hours. Which was not good for my sanity, nor body, nor my skin. “Niiii. Oh my god. I didn’t realise that it’s gonna be so long! My skiiinnn. Noooo.” I said looking at him and touching my face pouting. “Dramatic.” He just said smirking. “Hmmph. Fine. I won’t bother your time anymore mister.” I said facing away being mad fakingly. The tiredness from being in the plane for hours was making me more dramatic every second that passes. I can hear him chuckling from beside me.

“Aww baby. Such a spoiled girl.” He said gently facing my face to him again. “I know right? But I’m your spoiled girl.” I said smiling widely like I wasn’t just a dramatic bitch 5 seconds ago. My spoiled attitude is showung more and more.

“Eh no.” He said laughing at me. I frown and hit his upper arm. “Jerk.” I said and pouted again. I can tell he was getting amused more and more just from his damn smirk.

“Okay okay babe. Yer my spoiled little girl alright?” Niall said again still laughing lightly causing me to also laugh because who can stay mad while hearing his laugh? I was'nt even angry I was just bored and tired. “Hmm. Okay.” I said trying to resist the smile that is forming on my face. “Aye still tryna be mad at me eh?” I just shrug and cuddle further to his neck smiling. “Get some sleep love.” He said and I can feel him dropping a kiss on my head. I just nods and close my eyes hugging his arm and heading to sleep.

A/N well that’s it. And it is weird. But anyways send in request!

summary: You are the love of my life Pt.2
title: You are the love of my life Pt.2
body:
You are getting married, but not to Harry…

Part 1

wordcount: 2,178

masterlist

Standing there in front of you is Mitch. Mitchel Rowland, a friend you made through Harry. You invited him and his girlfriend, Sarah, as you had gotten to know them really well during Harry’s first solo tour, as they were both apart of the band. “Mitch?” you asked confused. You go in for a hug, as it had been a while since you last saw him. 

“Wow, you look amazing” he says looking at you up and down.

“Thanks, Mitch. Why are you here? The ceremony is starting soon, you better get back to your seat,” you say. 

“Y/N he is here” Mitch didn’t need to name him, you knew who he was talking about. 

“What? Why? He wasn’t invited?” you question him. “I know, I told him he shouldn’t be here, but he just showed up out of the blue. I told him to go home.” Mitch says with a smidge of annoyance in his voice.

The door behind you opens, and the same cologne you smelt before instantly fills your nose. You knew it isn’t the dress fitter as you look at Mitch’s face, his expression is a mix of confusion and anger. You then turn around to see him standing there. He is wearing a black suit, dressed for the wedding. But he wasn’t a guest.

His eyes lock on you, he gazes over your entire body, his eyes soften and his mouth gapes slightly. “You-you look beautiful” he stuttered out walking closer to you. 

Mitch just looks at the two of you “I’m gonna go back to my seat” he says walking out the door. “Mitch? Can you tell Grace I might be a while” he just nods, then shuts the door behind him.

“Harry, what are you doing here? Michale won’t be happy if he sees you” you look into his eyes, they are so familiar. More memories come flooding back of all the goodness you shared with him.

“Why didn’t you tell me you were getting married?” he says quietly, his voice is shaky, he isn’t angry, just hurt.

“I don’t know, Harry!” you raise your voice, he flinches at your change in tone.

“We haven’t spoken in years, and the album, god, I didn’t know what to say?” you sighed.

“You could have called,” he says slowly, looking up at you. “You could have called too!” you yell. 

“I know, but, I don’t know! I thought you would come back, like all the other times. But you never did, you moved on, found someone else, and now your getting married” he says throwing his hands up gesturing to your dress and everything around you. “I was stupid, I was so caught up in everything, I didn’t realise that I wasn’t enough for you. I’ve been beating myself up every day for never doing anything” he says looking to the ground, the light caught on his glassy eyes, when he blinked a tear came out.

“I didn’t want to ruin your happiness, Mitch told me you were happy with Michael” he wipes the tear away.

“I am happy with Michale,” you say sternly. It felt weird to say, especially to Harry.

“I know! That’s why I could never do this! You are finally happy after so long.” he exclaimed throwing his hands up in the air. “I saw the invitation on Mitch’s fridge, and I had to get away. While I was gone, all I did was think about you. I knew this would be my last chance” he pauses.

“Y/N when you left me, I so was caught up in the fame and the money, everything was crazy. And you were always there through everything. When you were gone I realised I had nothing without you. You were my happiness, you complete me” Your expression is blank. You didn’t know how to feel. Tears started welling up in your eyes, you tried to blink them back, but that only made them spill out.

“And I’ve tried, Y/N trust me I’ve tried to move on, but I can’t, your it for me. I love you. I never stopped, and whether you marry Michale today, I will still love you, for the rest of my life” There were tears running down both of your faces. "Don’t cry“ he says "Your gonna mess up your pretty face” he said wiping a tear away on your cheek. You push his hand off you and step back.

“You can’t just come to me and say all of this! And on my wedding day? Of all the days, you chose today? Harry, you have always had bad timing, but this, this is just the worst.” You’re angry but relieved at the same time. If he wasn’t here right now, you would be standing at the alter about to commit to something you weren’t 100% sure about.

“You always ruin everything good for me! God, when Michael asked me to be his girlfriend, your album came out the same fucking day!” you’re still yelling, even though you relived you still needed to vent your feelings.

“Everything I do, it’s like your ghost is there haunting me”

“We were so good Y/N, we were so in love” Harry pleads, taking your hands into his. His hands were warm, how they always were. Your hands fit perfectly in his.

“It was good, I loved you” you emphasized the loved, and pull away from his grip. “Harry your too late, I love Michale, and he makes me happy” you say, mostly to convince yourself.

“I’ve changed, losing you made me reali-" 

"You should go,” you say interrupting him. You couldn’t let him stop your wedding. 

“Y/N please,” he says with so much emotion in his voice, while wiping the tears from his eyes. You sit back down and start trying to fix to fix the mess you had made of your makeup. You get lost in thought as you dab at you undereye. Harry then sets a box down on the vanity in front of you. “What is this?” you ask him.

He opens it, and inside is a ring. The most beautiful ring you had ever seen. Three sparkling diamonds, with two rubies on each side. It was the exact ring you wanted. You remember back to the drunk conversation you had so many years ago when you told him about your dream ring. “I got it the month before you broke up with me. I was going to propose to you Y/N” You look up at him.

“Harry,” you say slowly. “It’s beautiful, perfect even, how, how did you remember?” you say quickly while picking up the box to get a closer look.

“I always remember” he says. 

“Why didn’t you tell me?!” You ask him angrily. “If you loved me so much you were going to propose, why didn’t you fucking tell me?”

“I was stupid Y/N, you broke my heart, and I didn’t think you would want me back.” The sadness in his eyes made you feel so much guilt. You try not let it get to you.

“But I kept it, I looked at it every night, contemplating whether I should have picked up the phone, and told you.” You find yourself wishing he called. 

Instead of telling him how you feel, you shut the box and place it in his hands. “I have to go, Harry, everyone is waiting" 

"I’m so sorry Y/N, I’m sorry I let you down” You close his hands around the box, and pull him in for a hug. The hug lasted for a long time. You could feel him crying as he buries his head into your hair, inhaling your scent for what would be the last time. The hug was a goodbye, and you both knew that. 

“Good luck” he says, pulling away. You wished the hug could last forever. “I hope he can make you happy” he says putting the box back into the pocket of his tailored black suit. 

“Goodbye Harry,” you say leaving out the door. You didn’t know what to feel. Everything Harry said was everything you wanted to hear but at the wrong time. 

You meet up with Grace, and she gives you a look. “I’m fine, let’s do this,” you say, trying to convince your self that this is the right decision. The music starts playing and you walk down the aisle, all your friends and family rise and look at you in awe. You’re clutching your bouquet so tight, your hands are white. This was it, too late to turn back now.

When Michale turns around to look at you, he wipes a tear from his eye. He looks so handsome. As you grab his hand joining him facing the priest, he whispers to you “You look amazing” while he squeezes your a hand.

“So do you” you say smiling. As the priest goes on, the feeling of uncertainty rises in your chest. 

“Are you sure you want to do this?” Michale whispers in your ear. You look at him with confusion on your face. What does he mean? Of course, you want to do this, don’t you? "You have to do what makes you happy" he continues, “I just want you to be happy” Did he see Harry? Did Harry talk to him? Your head is now spinning, why did this have to happen today, of all days, on your wedding day. You look at Michael, then look to the door you entered through. Were you really about to do this?

Tears are streaming down your face, you look at Michael and kiss him on the cheek, and whisper in his ear “I am so sorry.” Picking up your skirt you run back down the aisle. Guests are giving you horrified looks as gasps and chatter fill the church. Michale’s mother suddenly stands up, then your own mother and they just watch you run. No one stops you though. Everything is a blur, you see Mitch in the crowd of people, he sitting down, and he gives you a weak smile.

When you get out of the church into the parking lot, holding up as much of your expensive white dress as you can, you look for the black range rover you knew he would be in. You spot it and surely make your way over, it starts moving, he’s leaving. He obviously hasn’t seen you. As he turns out of the parking lot, and onto the street, you kick off your shoes and start running. 

"Harry! Stop!” you yell after the car. You then stop in the middle of the street as its no use. Just as you stop so does the car. He gets out, his face is red from crying. He runs to you, and you run to him. As you meet you jump into to him, wrapping your legs around his waist, just like you would do in the airport when he got back from a tour.

His lips immediately crash into yours. You kiss him like your life depended on it. It felt so good, it had been so many years since your lips were on his. “I fucking hate you” you say to him breathlessly between kisses. He is holding on to you so tight like he would never let you go.

“I fucking love you” he says laughing. You continue kissing, without a care in the world. Even though you just abandoned your own wedding, you didn’t care because kissing Harry at this moment felt so right.

“I promise I will be everything you want, I love you Y/N” he carries you to the passenger seat of his car, and you get in stuffing you dress so it doesn’t get caught in the door. He gets in and drives. He stops at a nearby park. You look at him “What about the wedding?” he asks you. 

“I don’t know,” you say sighing. “I just knew if I said ‘I do’, I would regret it” you say turning to him, taking his hands into yours.

“You will always be a part of my life, I will always love you and I can’t just pretend I don’t. I was doing that for so long, and you made me realise I can’t ignore my feelings. I can’t just push them to the side and think they will go away.” He looks into your eyes, and he has the biggest smile on his face, it’s contagious. You smile back at him.

“A little part of me was always wishing it was you and not him, and when he turned around at the altar, I wanted it to be you. I don’t care about what our future holds, all I know is right now, I want to be with you.” You squeeze his hands so tight.

"I promise to love you and make you happy.” he pulls you in for a hug, followed by a long passionate kiss.

“You are the love of my life” he says when he pulls away.

You knew you had done the right thing.

wordcount: 2,178

masterlist

Standing there in front of you is Mitch. Mitchel Rowland, a friend you made through Harry. You invited him and his girlfriend, Sarah, as you had gotten to know them really well during Harry’s first solo tour, as they were both apart of the band. “Mitch?” you asked confused. You go in for a hug, as it had been a while since you last saw him. 

“Wow, you look amazing” he says looking at you up and down.

“Thanks, Mitch. Why are you here? The ceremony is starting soon, you better get back to your seat,” you say. 

“Y/N he is here” Mitch didn’t need to name him, you knew who he was talking about. 

“What? Why? He wasn’t invited?” you question him. “I know, I told him he shouldn’t be here, but he just showed up out of the blue. I told him to go home.” Mitch says with a smidge of annoyance in his voice.

The door behind you opens, and the same cologne you smelt before instantly fills your nose. You knew it isn’t the dress fitter as you look at Mitch’s face, his expression is a mix of confusion and anger. You then turn around to see him standing there. He is wearing a black suit, dressed for the wedding. But he wasn’t a guest.

His eyes lock on you, he gazes over your entire body, his eyes soften and his mouth gapes slightly. “You-you look beautiful” he stuttered out walking closer to you. 

Mitch just looks at the two of you “I’m gonna go back to my seat” he says walking out the door. “Mitch? Can you tell Grace I might be a while” he just nods, then shuts the door behind him.

“Harry, what are you doing here? Michale won’t be happy if he sees you” you look into his eyes, they are so familiar. More memories come flooding back of all the goodness you shared with him.

“Why didn’t you tell me you were getting married?” he says quietly, his voice is shaky, he isn’t angry, just hurt.

“I don’t know, Harry!” you raise your voice, he flinches at your change in tone.

“We haven’t spoken in years, and the album, god, I didn’t know what to say?” you sighed.

“You could have called,” he says slowly, looking up at you. “You could have called too!” you yell. 

“I know, but, I don’t know! I thought you would come back, like all the other times. But you never did, you moved on, found someone else, and now your getting married” he says throwing his hands up gesturing to your dress and everything around you. “I was stupid, I was so caught up in everything, I didn’t realise that I wasn’t enough for you. I’ve been beating myself up every day for never doing anything” he says looking to the ground, the light caught on his glassy eyes, when he blinked a tear came out.

“I didn’t want to ruin your happiness, Mitch told me you were happy with Michael” he wipes the tear away.

“I am happy with Michale,” you say sternly. It felt weird to say, especially to Harry.

“I know! That’s why I could never do this! You are finally happy after so long.” he exclaimed throwing his hands up in the air. “I saw the invitation on Mitch’s fridge, and I had to get away. While I was gone, all I did was think about you. I knew this would be my last chance” he pauses.

“Y/N when you left me, I so was caught up in the fame and the money, everything was crazy. And you were always there through everything. When you were gone I realised I had nothing without you. You were my happiness, you complete me” Your expression is blank. You didn’t know how to feel. Tears started welling up in your eyes, you tried to blink them back, but that only made them spill out.

“And I’ve tried, Y/N trust me I’ve tried to move on, but I can’t, your it for me. I love you. I never stopped, and whether you marry Michale today, I will still love you, for the rest of my life” There were tears running down both of your faces. "Don’t cry“ he says "Your gonna mess up your pretty face” he said wiping a tear away on your cheek. You push his hand off you and step back.

“You can’t just come to me and say all of this! And on my wedding day? Of all the days, you chose today? Harry, you have always had bad timing, but this, this is just the worst.” You’re angry but relieved at the same time. If he wasn’t here right now, you would be standing at the alter about to commit to something you weren’t 100% sure about.

“You always ruin everything good for me! God, when Michael asked me to be his girlfriend, your album came out the same fucking day!” you’re still yelling, even though you relived you still needed to vent your feelings.

“Everything I do, it’s like your ghost is there haunting me”

“We were so good Y/N, we were so in love” Harry pleads, taking your hands into his. His hands were warm, how they always were. Your hands fit perfectly in his.

“It was good, I loved you” you emphasized the loved, and pull away from his grip. “Harry your too late, I love Michale, and he makes me happy” you say, mostly to convince yourself.

“I’ve changed, losing you made me reali-" 

"You should go,” you say interrupting him. You couldn’t let him stop your wedding. 

“Y/N please,” he says with so much emotion in his voice, while wiping the tears from his eyes. You sit back down and start trying to fix to fix the mess you had made of your makeup. You get lost in thought as you dab at you undereye. Harry then sets a box down on the vanity in front of you. “What is this?” you ask him.

He opens it, and inside is a ring. The most beautiful ring you had ever seen. Three sparkling diamonds, with two rubies on each side. It was the exact ring you wanted. You remember back to the drunk conversation you had so many years ago when you told him about your dream ring. “I got it the month before you broke up with me. I was going to propose to you Y/N” You look up at him.

“Harry,” you say slowly. “It’s beautiful, perfect even, how, how did you remember?” you say quickly while picking up the box to get a closer look.

“I always remember” he says. 

“Why didn’t you tell me?!” You ask him angrily. “If you loved me so much you were going to propose, why didn’t you fucking tell me?”

“I was stupid Y/N, you broke my heart, and I didn’t think you would want me back.” The sadness in his eyes made you feel so much guilt. You try not let it get to you.

“But I kept it, I looked at it every night, contemplating whether I should have picked up the phone, and told you.” You find yourself wishing he called.

“I know! That’s why I could never do this! You are finally happy after so long.” he exclaimed throwing his hands up in the air. “I saw the invitation on Mitch’s fridge, and I had to get away. While I was gone, all I did was think about you. I knew this would be my last chance” he pauses.

“Y/N when you left me, I so was caught up in the fame and the money, everything was crazy. And you were always there through everything. When you were gone I realised I had nothing without you. You were my happiness, you complete me” Your expression is blank. You didn’t know how to feel. Tears started welling up in your eyes, you tried to blink them back, but that only made them spill out.

“And I’ve tried, Y/N trust me I’ve tried to move on, but I can’t, your it for me. I love you. I never stopped, and whether you marry Michale today, I will still love you, for the rest of my life” There were tears running down both of your faces. "Don’t cry“ he says "Your gonna mess up your pretty face” he said wiping a tear away on your cheek. You push his hand off you and step back.

“You can’t just come to me and say all of this! And on my wedding day? Of all the days, you chose today? Harry, you have always had bad timing, but this, this is just the worst.” You’re angry but relieved at the same time. If he wasn’t here right now, you would be standing at the alter about to commit to something you weren’t 100% sure about.

“You always ruin everything good for me! God, when Michael asked me to be his girlfriend, your album came out the same fucking day!” you’re still yelling, even though you relived you still needed to vent your feelings.

“Everything I do, it’s like your ghost is there haunting me”

“We were so good Y/N, we were so in love” Harry pleads, taking your hands into his. His hands were warm, how they always were. Your hands fit perfectly in his.

“It was good, I loved you” you emphasized the loved, and pull away from his grip. “Harry your too late, I love Michale, and he makes me happy” you say, mostly to convince yourself.

“I’ve changed, losing you made me reali-" 

"You should go,” you say interrupting him. You couldn’t let him stop your wedding. 

“Y/N please,” he says with so much emotion in his voice, while wiping the tears from his eyes. You sit back down and start trying to fix to fix the mess you had made of your makeup. You get lost in thought as you dab at you undereye. Harry then sets a box down on the vanity in front of you. “What is this?” you ask him.

He opens it, and inside is a ring. The most beautiful ring you had ever seen. Three sparkling diamonds, with two rubies on each side. It was the exact ring you wanted. You remember back to the drunk conversation you had so many years ago when you told him about your dream ring. “I got it the month before you broke up with me. I was going to propose to you Y/N” You look up at him.

“Harry,” you say slowly. “It’s beautiful, perfect even, how, how did you remember?” you say quickly while picking up the box to get a closer look.

“I always remember” he says. 

“Why didn’t you tell me?!” You ask him angrily. “If you loved me so much you were going to propose, why didn’t you fucking tell me?”

“I was stupid Y/N, you broke my heart, and I didn’t think you would want me back.” The sadness in his eyes made you feel so much guilt. You try not let it get to you.

“But I kept it, I looked at it every night, contemplating whether I should have picked up the phone, and told you.” You find yourself wishing he called. 

Instead of telling him how you feel, you shut the box and place it in his hands. “I have to go, Harry, everyone is waiting" 

"I’m so sorry Y/N, I’m sorry I let you down” You close his hands around the box, and pull him in for a hug. The hug lasted for a long time. You could feel him crying as he buries his head into your hair, inhaling your scent for what would be the last time. The hug was a goodbye, and you both knew that. 

“Good luck” he says, pulling away. You wished the hug could last forever. “I hope he can make you happy” he says putting the box back into the pocket of his tailored black suit. 

“Goodbye Harry,” you say leaving out the door. You didn’t know what to feel. Everything Harry said was everything you wanted to hear but at the wrong time. 

You meet up with Grace, and she gives you a look. “I’m fine, let’s do this,” you say, trying to convince your self that this is the right decision. The music starts playing and you walk down the aisle, all your friends and family rise and look at you in awe. You’re clutching your bouquet so tight, your hands are white. This was it, too late to turn back now.

When Michale turns around to look at you, he wipes a tear from his eye. He looks so handsome. As you grab his hand joining him facing the priest, he whispers to you “You look amazing” while he squeezes your a hand.

“So do you” you say smiling. As the priest goes on, the feeling of uncertainty rises in your chest. 

“Are you sure you want to do this?” Michale whispers in your ear. You look at him with confusion on your face. What does he mean? Of course, you want to do this, don’t you? "You have to do what makes you happy" he continues, “I just want you to be happy” Did he see Harry? Did Harry talk to him? Your head is now spinning, why did this have to happen today, of all days, on your wedding day. You look at Michael, then look to the door you entered through. Were you really about to do this?

Tears are streaming down your face, you look at Michael and kiss him on the cheek, and whisper in his ear “I am so sorry.” Picking up your skirt you run back down the aisle. Guests are giving you horrified looks as gasps and chatter fill the church. Michale’s mother suddenly stands up, then your own mother and they just watch you run. No one stops you though. Everything is a blur, you see Mitch in the crowd of people, he sitting down, and he gives you a weak smile.

When you get out of the church into the parking lot, holding up as much of your expensive white dress as you can, you look for the black range rover you knew he would be in. You spot it and surely make your way over, it starts moving, he’s leaving. He obviously hasn’t seen you. As he turns out of the parking lot, and onto the street, you kick off your shoes and start running. 

"Harry! Stop!” you yell after the car. You then stop in the middle of the street as its no use. Just as you stop so does the car. He gets out, his face is red from crying. He runs to you, and you run to him. As you meet you jump into to him, wrapping your legs around his waist, just like you would do in the airport when he got back from a tour.

His lips immediately crash into yours. You kiss him like your life depended on it. It felt so good, it had been so many years since your lips were on his. “I fucking hate you” you say to him breathlessly between kisses. He is holding on to you so tight like he would never let you go.

“I fucking love you” he says laughing. You continue kissing, without a care in the world. Even though you just abandoned your own wedding, you didn’t care because kissing Harry at this moment felt so right.

“I promise I will be everything you want, I love you Y/N” he carries you to the passenger seat of his car, and you get in stuffing you dress so it doesn’t get caught in the door. He gets in and drives. He stops at a nearby park. You look at him “What about the wedding?” he asks you. 

“I don’t know,” you say sighing. “I just knew if I said ‘I do’, I would regret it” you say turning to him, taking his hands into yours.

“You will always be a part of my life, I will always love you and I can’t just pretend I don’t. I was doing that for so long, and you made me realise I can’t ignore my feelings. I can’t just push them to the side and think they will go away.” He looks into your eyes, and he has the biggest smile on his face, it’s contagious. You smile back at him.

“A little part of me was always wishing it was you and not him, and when he turned around at the altar, I wanted it to be you. I don’t care about what our future holds, all I know is right now, I want to be with you.” You squeeze his hands so tight.

"I promise to love you and make you happy.” he pulls you in for a hug, followed by a long passionate kiss.

“You are the love of my life” he says when he pulls away.

You knew you had done the right thing.

summary:
Ok. Imaginen esto, obviamente tendremos el regreso de 1D (con Zayn por supuesto) ¿verdad? 
Ok. Picture this, obviously we will...
body:
¿Sería mucho pedir? / It would be too much to ask?

Ok. Imaginen esto, obviamente tendremos el regreso de 1D (con Zayn por supuesto) ¿verdad?

Ok. Picture this, obviously we will have the return of 1D (with Zayn of course) right?

Y ¿no creen que sería la mejor cosa de la vida que en su concierto (o tour) de reunión los chicos, además de cantar los mas grandes éxitos de One Direction sacaran nuevos temas? Definitivamente alucinante, asombroso, maravilloso…

And don’t you think it would be the best thing in life that in their concert (or tour) of reunion the boys, in addition to singing the greatest hits of One Direction, will bring new songs? Definitely amazing, incredible, wonderful…

Ahora, hay otra cosa aun mejor… Pero a pesar de que nunca pase, soñar no cuesta nada.

Now, there is something even better … But even though it never happens, dreaming don’t cost anything.

Solo traten de imaginar (y espero que su lindo corazón lo soporte) ¡¡¡¡a nuestros muchachos cantar los temas de solista de cada uno!!!! Ya se, me dirán que me estoy emocionando de mas, pero no puedo evitarlo.

Just try to imagine (and I hope your cute heart will support it) to our guys sing the solo songs of each one !!!! I know, you will tell me that I am getting excited, but I can’t help it.

Es decir, seriamos todos bendecidos al escuchar en la voz de todos una de las grandiosas canciones de Harry.

That is, we would all be blessed to hear one of Harry’s great songs in everyone’s voice.

Que regalo nos darían al interpretar una canción tan suave como Meet Me In The Hallway o cantar casi en un susurro From The Dinning Table.

What a gift they would give us when they performed a song as soft as Meet Me In The Hallway or sing almost in a whisper From The Dinning Table.

O romper el escenario con Kiwi, Only Angel o Carolina. Ahh que belleza.

Or break the stage with Kiwi, Only Angel or Carolina. Ahh what beauty.

Y ni hablar de los temas de Niall, son de esas canciones que escuchas y cantas con tus amigos o simplemente la escuchas a solas y disfrutas de las dulces composiciones del ex rubio.

And not to mention Niall’s songs, are those songs that you listen to and sing with your friends or just listen to them alone and enjoy the sweet compositions of the ex-blond.

Too much to ask sin duda es la clase de melodía que encajaría con los chicos.

Too much to ask is definitely the kind of melody that would fit with the guys.

¿O Slow Hands? Me encanta.

Or Slow Hands? I love it.

Con los singles de Liam… ellos absolutamente nos pondrán a bailar, solo piensen en ellos moviéndose al ritmo de esa musica sensualmente junto con las letras. Oh My God.

With the Liam’s singles … they’ll absolutely start dancing, just think of them moving to the rhythm of that music sensually along with the lyrics. Oh My God.

“So put your hands on my boodyyy…”

“I wanna go hooooome with you”

🎤🎵🎶

Continuemos con Louis, Boo bear o como quieran llamarlo, este bebé también tiene su propio estilo y QUE ESTILO, es decir es muy muy muy Louis, escucho sus canciones y pienso “Eso es lo que Louis cantaría” y agregando 4 voces mas resultaría magnifico.

Let’s continue with Louis, Boo bear or whatever you want to call him, this baby also has his own style and THAT STYLE, that is very very very Louis, I listen to his songs and I think “That’s what Louis would sing” and adding 4 more voices would be great .

¿Just Like You o Miss You?

Just Like You or Miss You?

Obvio no puede faltar el single con el que todo empezó. Just Hold On.

Obviously you can’t miss the single with which everything started. Just Hold On.

Finalmente ZAYN, Oh Zayn no hace falta mencionar que el estilo del Sr. Malik es bastante peculiar, distinto al de los demás, pues aunque él sigue el tema del “pop” (alternativo) la mayoría de sus canciones son R&B.

Finally Zayn, Oh Zayn need not mention that Mr. Malik’s style is quite peculiar, different from the others, because although he follows the theme of “pop” (alternative) most of his songs are R & B.

Pero eso no sería un problema para nuestros muchachos, sabemos que con su inmenso talento pueden con lo que sea y quien dice que como una banda no puedan cantar dRuNk.

But that wouldn’t be a problem for our boys, we know that with their immense talent they can do anything and who says that as a band they can’t sing dRuNk.

O algo mas lento, romántico y emocional como fOol fOr YoU 💘.

Or something slower, romantic and emotional like fOol fOr YoU 💘.

Como sea, yo pensé en esto y quería compartirlo con ustedes y aquí esta.

Anyway, I thought about this and I wanted to share it with you and here it is.

Ya me iba pero acabo de pensar en esto lol: Si para el regreso de 1D LARRY ya esta confirmado y en uno de sus conciertos podamos ver a Harry y a Louis cantar Sweet Creature JUNTOS y mirándose tan enamorados frente a los fans que estuvieron con ellos desde siempre. Dios Ayudame. O si ZIAM se confirma para entonces y los veamos cantarse uno al otro para hacerme feliz pero al mismo tiempo sufrir porque no puedo con tanto amor que se dan… Ok! Basta creo que estoy delirando y no me hace bien. XD

I was leaving but I just thought about this lol: If for the comeback of 1D LARRY is already confirmed and in one of their concerts we can see Harry and Louis sing Sweet Creature TOGETHER and looking so in love with each other un front of the fans that were with them from forever. God help me. Or if ZIAM is confirmed by then and we see them sing to each other to make me happy but at the same time suffer because I can’t with so much love that they give … Ok! Enough I think I’m delirious and it doesn’t do me any good. XD

Bueno, esta es la despedida oficial espero que les haya gustado leer esto e ilusionarse como yo, por favor no me juzguen pero no pueden negar que si esto ocurre de verdad nos harán tan felices. (Aunque que haya muy poca probabilidad 💔)

Well, this is the official farewell I hope you have enjoyed reading this and deluding yourself like me, please don’t judge me but you can’t deny that if this really happens they will make us so happy. (Although there is very little probability 💔)

Sigan Juntos.

Keep together.

❤

Fotos: Crédito a los propietarios

Images: Credit to the owners

And don’t you think it would be the best thing in life that in their concert (or tour) of reunion the boys, in addition to singing the greatest hits of One Direction, will bring new songs? Definitely amazing, incredible, wonderful…

Ahora, hay otra cosa aun mejor… Pero a pesar de que nunca pase, soñar no cuesta nada.

Now, there is something even better … But even though it never happens, dreaming don’t cost anything.

Solo traten de imaginar (y espero que su lindo corazón lo soporte) ¡¡¡¡a nuestros muchachos cantar los temas de solista de cada uno!!!! Ya se, me dirán que me estoy emocionando de mas, pero no puedo evitarlo.

Just try to imagine (and I hope your cute heart will support it) to our guys sing the solo songs of each one !!!! I know, you will tell me that I am getting excited, but I can’t help it.

Es decir, seriamos todos bendecidos al escuchar en la voz de todos una de las grandiosas canciones de Harry.

That is, we would all be blessed to hear one of Harry’s great songs in everyone’s voice.

Que regalo nos darían al interpretar una canción tan suave como Meet Me In The Hallway o cantar casi en un susurro From The Dinning Table.

What a gift they would give us when they performed a song as soft as Meet Me In The Hallway or sing almost in a whisper From The Dinning Table.

O romper el escenario con Kiwi, Only Angel o Carolina. Ahh que belleza.

Or break the stage with Kiwi, Only Angel or Carolina. Ahh what beauty.

Y ni hablar de los temas de Niall, son de esas canciones que escuchas y cantas con tus amigos o simplemente la escuchas a solas y disfrutas de las dulces composiciones del ex rubio.

And not to mention Niall’s songs, are those songs that you listen to and sing with your friends or just listen to them alone and enjoy the sweet compositions of the ex-blond.

Too much to ask sin duda es la clase de melodía que encajaría con los chicos.

Too much to ask is definitely the kind of melody that would fit with the guys.

¿O Slow Hands? Me encanta.

Or Slow Hands? I love it.

Con los singles de Liam… ellos absolutamente nos pondrán a bailar, solo piensen en ellos moviéndose al ritmo de esa musica sensualmente junto con las letras. Oh My God.

With the Liam’s singles … they’ll absolutely start dancing, just think of them moving to the rhythm of that music sensually along with the lyrics. Oh My God.

“So put your hands on my boodyyy…”

“I wanna go hooooome with you”

🎤🎵🎶

Continuemos con Louis, Boo bear o como quieran llamarlo, este bebé también tiene su propio estilo y QUE ESTILO, es decir es muy muy muy Louis, escucho sus canciones y pienso “Eso es lo que Louis cantaría” y agregando 4 voces mas resultaría magnifico.

Let’s continue with Louis, Boo bear or whatever you want to call him, this baby also has his own style and THAT STYLE, that is very very very Louis, I listen to his songs and I think “That’s what Louis would sing” and adding 4 more voices would be great .

¿Just Like You o Miss You?

Just Like You or Miss You?

Obvio no puede faltar el single con el que todo empezó. Just Hold On.

Obviously you can’t miss the single with which everything started. Just Hold On.

Finalmente ZAYN, Oh Zayn no hace falta mencionar que el estilo del Sr. Malik es bastante peculiar, distinto al de los demás, pues aunque él sigue el tema del “pop” (alternativo) la mayoría de sus canciones son R&B.

Finally Zayn, Oh Zayn need not mention that Mr. Malik’s style is quite peculiar, different from the others, because although he follows the theme of “pop” (alternative) most of his songs are R & B.

Pero eso no sería un problema para nuestros muchachos, sabemos que con su inmenso talento pueden con lo que sea y quien dice que como una banda no puedan cantar dRuNk.

But that wouldn’t be a problem for our boys, we know that with their immense talent they can do anything and who says that as a band they can’t sing dRuNk.

O algo mas lento, romántico y emocional como fOol fOr YoU 💘.

Or something slower, romantic and emotional like fOol fOr YoU 💘.

Como sea, yo pensé en esto y quería compartirlo con ustedes y aquí esta.

Anyway, I thought about this and I wanted to share it with you and here it is.

Ya me iba pero acabo de pensar en esto lol: Si para el regreso de 1D LARRY ya esta confirmado y en uno de sus conciertos podamos ver a Harry y a Louis cantar Sweet Creature JUNTOS y mirándose tan enamorados frente a los fans que estuvieron con ellos desde siempre. Dios Ayudame. O si ZIAM se confirma para entonces y los veamos cantarse uno al otro para hacerme feliz pero al mismo tiempo sufrir porque no puedo con tanto amor que se dan… Ok! Basta creo que estoy delirando y no me hace bien. XD

I was leaving but I just thought about this lol: If for the comeback of 1D LARRY is already confirmed and in one of their concerts we can see Harry and Louis sing Sweet Creature TOGETHER and looking so in love with each other un front of the fans that were with them from forever. God help me. Or if ZIAM is confirmed by then and we see them sing to each other to make me happy but at the same time suffer because I can’t with so much love that they give … Ok! Enough I think I’m delirious and it doesn’t do me any good. XD

Bueno, esta es la despedida oficial espero que les haya gustado leer esto e ilusionarse como yo, por favor no me juzguen pero no pueden negar que si esto ocurre de verdad nos harán tan felices. (Aunque que haya muy poca probabilidad 💔)

Well, this is the official farewell I hope you have enjoyed reading this and deluding yourself like me, please don’t judge me but you can’t deny that if this really happens they will make us so happy. (Although there is very little probability 💔)

Sigan Juntos.

Keep together.

❤

Fotos: Crédito a los propietarios

Images: Credit to the owners

body:
Hi non-larries!

Only one thing, you DO understand that even if Larry doesn’t come out real, (which will never happen probably) we will still ship it? I mean c'mon, it’s a ship, we will still ship it even when both H & L admit it’s not real. Yes the belief will go definitely, but the ship? Nah. So kindly continue with your hopeless attempts to deny it. I don’t think we (atleast I) give a fuck about that. K…
